alert.note: Alert for Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Republic County through 845 PM CDT... At 758 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms extending from 4 miles southwest of Deshler to near Norway. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. The gusty winds will arrive ahead of the rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belleville, Scandia, Courtland, Cuba, Norway, Republic, Munden, Narka and Agenda. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
